BAD_REQUEST: Bad Request! It seems your request is not processable.
ACCOUNT_IS_BLOCKED: Your account is disabled, please contact support!
YOUR_ACCOUNT_IS_NOT_ACTIVE: Your Account Is Deactivated, before any action Active your account!
STORAGE_IS_UNAVAILABLE: The Storage Service is unavailable, please try again!
INVALID_AVATAR_FILE_FORMAT: Invalid Avatar File Format, Only png and jpg supported!
ATTACHMENT_OWNED_BY_ANOTHER_PERSON: This Attachment is owned by another person.
PUBLIC_ATTACHMENT_ALLOWED: Only public attachments allowed for this section
PRIVATE_ATTACHMENT_ALLOWED: Only private attachments allowed for this section
